phrases: Yeah, the maple trees on the mountain are a lot prettier too.
Let us go to the Futaba Dam sometime soon.
I will bring along some XXX stuff then.
Do not bother with him, Natsume.
You take care of the sandwiches, Natsume.
Sorry, I cannot make lunches on my days off.
I am sure she will be happy.
And I will be happy too!
You saw me, did not you?
I am coming to eat you!
We are having fried squid tonight.
I told you, I am not a cat!
What is with that mark, Natsume?
You got a curse on your arm, did not you?
It is nothing to laugh about, you idiot!
How dare he lay his hands on my prey?
And he is going to eat you?
but I simply cannot allow him to get you before I do.
let us call someone else to be your bodyguard in my place.
We will use the Book of Friends.
Next, put that white cloth on and then stand right in the middle of the characters.
It is to substitute a white robe.
You cannot call them unless you know their name and how they look,
so let us try to call Misuzu from before.
Natsume, place the Book of Friends and the mirror beside each other and then drop some blood on it.
Normally, they would want a fingernail.
Do not think you can deal with Ayakashi without some compensation.
It has been a while, Natsume-dono.
I am sorry I could not return your name last time, Misuzu.
Please help me for a while.
It spread out more than before.
I am not familiar with curses, though.
I will send for someone else.
That would be a huge help.
However, Natsume-dono, you should not show any weaknesses to Ayakashi.
Ayakashi attack people through their weaknesses and shadows.
Loneliness can serve as compensation for Ayakashi.
You are being quite rude to your master, Misuzu.
Do not get too ahead of yourself.
And this coming from you, Madara?
I cannot believe you can call yourself his bodyguard when he has some mark now.
Natsume-dono, please forget that cat doll and call upon me anytime.
Well then, I shall call for Hinoe.
You have finally called for me...
Did those humans bully you again?
Shall I curse to death all the ones who touched you?
She is a big Reiko lover.
What is with that small, furry form?
Did you want Reiko to like you that much?
She died a long time ago.
That is why I hate getting attached to people.
Do not get closer to me, you damned man!
You are crying for Reiko-san, right?
Misuzu-dono had said that Natsume called for me...
So I got a bit excited.
It is the Five Day Mark.
This Ayakashi cannot move, and so he places marks on people passing by.
For five days, the mark will comsume their life force,
and will draw them to the owner of the mark to be eaten.
By repeating that, the owner of the mark will gain the power to be free.
I cannot remember which way I went.
You probably went on some path humans can not take,
and met the owner of that mark.
It will be bothersome, but I will look into it.
I got myself involved in some bad business.
What is wrong with your arm?
It got scraped on a tree branch.
My, my, it will be bad if it festers.
It is a horror story where some unknown creature gets closer and closer to you.
and they say, I am Merry.
I am at the front gate now.
After a while, another call comes.
I am at the front door.
Does it have something to do with this mark?
You have the same face as Reiko, so do not make such a pathetic expression.
I found out who the owner of the mark is.
It is a powerful evil spirit that is been sealed away for a long time.
It uses the mark to hunt its prey.
Bit by bit, it stores its power.
It seems that if it eats one more, the seal will be broken.
And the evil spirit, unable to wait to restore its power, sends out a shadow.
The shadow will suck the life from you through the mark, and it will be able to move faster and faster.
It is still slow now, and was finally able to find your house.
You will die if it touches you.
My power is not stable because of the effects of the curse.
That is strange, I thought I heard his voice.
No one without the mark can touch it.
The Five Day Mark will only last four more days.
You just have to run away for that period.
I just need to run away?
I do not want to worry them.
I do not know what may happen if I am with them.
If I camp out and return by morning,
I should not go back home.
Fortunately, it is a long weekend tomorrow.
Did you fall in love with some foreigner or something, Natsume?
I will be staying at my friend's house for the next three days.
I wonder if she will worry.
I will because her trouble if I am there, though.
You like humans, do not you?
I did not like them when I was small.
But after meeting kind people, I learned what kindness was.
I did not want to run away anymore.
I wanted to become kind too.
You are a man, so what is with the lame talk?
Geez, it will just be this once, but how would you like having a servant to protect you?
A creature of light that can expel the darkness.
I will teach you how to summon one.
It will be tough, so do you want to do it?
With your energy, it will be a one-shot battle.
Either a big one will show up, or a useless little one.
Why do you look like Reiko, yet you are a man?!
Rest a bit before the real thing.
Guess I will go get some fish.
I want... to go back home...
I summon thee from the paths of light,
Your mark is gone as well.
Watching you, all I could see was your desire to protect important things,
and not wanting to cause trouble for others.
I hate people who do not treasure themselves.
A test to see whether I should entrust my name to a human child or not.
I am the one that made the path to lead you to the evil spirit.
If you were eaten, then that would have been it.
I would then take the Book of Friends for myself.
I shall entrust my name to you for a while.
I do not terribly hate having my name called.
I do not mind being called by you, either.
If you ever find yourself in despair from humans, come to me anytime.
I told you so many times to give me the contact information!
Just how worried do you think I was?
I do not mind you staying at your friend's house,
but you have to tell me where!
What will I do if something happens?
I did not even get one wink of sleep!
Back at this kind and warm house, where I live with my precious family.
The kind people I met in this city are here.
Was I able to do something for them?
